name: Employment
description: TCDC office is open by appointment only. Contact via email at TCDCsecretary@outlook.com for regular updates or call (415) 206-9101 TCDC assists underserved and disadvantaged residents of San Francisco with obtaining jobs and self employment opportunities by providing the following: - Counseling - Job search - Resume writing workshops - Skill building classes - Referrals to: - Educational, entrepreneurship and vocation training - Academic enrichment - College prep How to Apply: - Call TCDC-SF at
